short_summary: Deputy Sergeant-at-Rarms of the House of Commons seeks to acquire a contract for a service package that includes experienced IT professionals, along with hardware and a software solution.

# Tender Announcement - EN578-172870-THS-SAT-5.1
** solicitationNumber-numeroSollicitation : ** 202401151
** publicationDate-datePublication : ** 2023-07-28
** tenderClosingDate-appelOffresDateCloture : ** 2023-08-03T14:00:00

## Project Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking Temporary Help Services (THS) to support its Computer Application Support requirements. This announcement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified under the stream and category of 5.1 Computer and Application Support.

## Eligible Suppliers
A list of eligible suppliers who have been invited to submit a proposal is provided below:

1. 1019837 Ontario Inc. o/a Dynamic Personnel Consultants
2. CGI Information Systems and Management Consultants Inc.
3. CLOSEREACH LTD., OTUS Group In Joint Venture
4. Fanar Enterprise Solutions Inc.
5. Nisha Technologies Inc.
6. Orangutech Inc.
7. Quarry Consulting
8. TechWind Inc.
9. TECSIS Corporation
10. Thinkpoint Inc.
11. TPG Technology Consulting Ltd.
12. EXperis-Veritaaq

## Project Details
The proposed period of contract is from September 5th, 2023 to August 5th, 2024. The estimated level of effort for the contract is 240 days.

## Security Clearance
The resources assigned to this project must have a minimum clearance level of SECRET.
